issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Defect id#001:Requirement 1
detected by:Abishek
detected on:24-03-2013 at 4:12pm.
defect Environment: Windows XP 64 bit
Build Version: V19


Defect discription:
         -->If the user want to withdrawn amount in ATM system,if he entered denominations other than 100rs,500rs and 1000rs, then the message is displaying like "invalid amount....this ATM dispense bill with denominations of p100,p500,p1000".
         


expected value:
"the amount entered is invalid". 

actual value:
"invalid amount ....this ATM dispense bill with denominations of p100,p500,p1000".

steps to reproduce :
            1)insert ATM card
            2)enter valid pin number
            3)select withdrawn option
            4)enter denominations amount of 450 
            5)displaying an error
fields.summary: Invalid error message is displayed, Without entering any values from Username field and while clicking login button.
